column2: ENGLISH
Unholy Statues
These statues of unholy creatures strike terror in the hearts of enemies and inspire the dark army.
Sanctuary of Shadows
This sanctuary serves as meeting places for acolytes.
Black Walls
The walls of this building are made of black stone unknown to mortal races.
Crimson Hall
This hall is luxuriously decorated in red decorations and scarlet coloured curtains and used for military meetings
Slaughterhouse
Here, the best necromancers turn the flesh of mortal races into works of art.
Nerubian Busts
These cold black eyes cause any mortal to panic.
Endless Corridors
Giant network of corridors connecting crypts and giant halls.
Twilight Altar
Every death brings the Old Gods closer to the complete corruption of this world.
Old Gods' Relics
Pulsating fetid flesh of the Old Gods.
Black Obelisks
Only the Old Gods know the purpose of these monumental structures.
Soul Extractor
A tool used to extract the soul of mortal creatures.
Demonic Machinery
Giant fel mechanisms supporting the work of this complex.
Fel Pool
This pool of Fel Energy feeds the demonic creatures inhabiting this structure.
A beautiful piece of art reflecting a mythical scene.
Giant Spire
On top of the [FromFrom.GetWonderTypeShortCap] is a big spire, embellishing the silhouette of the building.
The secrets of building great edifices, roads, and bridges are revealed in the classical works of ancient authors.
From the works of Kaldorei thinkers, to the most recent treatises on mathematics.
